column4: How do I kill an unkillable process? Even kill -9 isn't working
convert, I was going to convert a jpeg to png but the file is read only and I guess copyrighted so it crashed
So, What is the app you want to kill ?
I tried sudo kill -9 15553 without success
killall -9 *convert*, don't think * works but try
n8tuser I used a paperclip to force the cd out, still can't kill it, I think a logout is the only answer
may be "logout" the easiest answer, but i think there's a way to do that
A way to do what? Kill it?
